name: Dolly (kbitchio)
description:
After experiencing a recurring nightmare, you are tempted to try and find a girl's Doll.

THIS IS ONE OF MY FIRST EVER VISUAL NOVELS.

Notice: I am starting work on a bigger, longer visual novel that will talk about the causes of bullying.

Many thanks  to all of the OpenGameArt community for the sound effects and music.

Also, many thanks to owners of the art used. As this was made a few years ago I cannot remember who made the art so if any of you can help, please find the art that you can see used in the project.

Many thanks to the renpy engine for making this possible and those who, like said before, made the art, music and sound effects.

Apart from the games music and sounds, I am behind the programming and story of the game.

Thank you if you read this far!

Downloading and Installing:

Please select the file for your operating system.
Top file is for Linux Operating Systems.
Middle File is for Macintosh Operating Systems.
Bottom File is for Windows Operating Systems.

Donations are not needed and have been disabled as this project has no commercial intent.

P.S. I am very happy to make my first ever online game!
